title: Team looking for jungler
body:
Team looking for jungler who has time during the day and/or evenings.
As a team we are looking to play as many tournaments as we can sign up for. Our jungler is left and we are looking for a replacement. We are looking for someone who wants to improve & wants to help improve the team.

Our team:
gold & plat adc/mid
gold adc/sup
gold & plat jungle
gold & silver top

Though we still require improvement and training, we are looking for a MAIN jungler Gold3+ to join us.
English is required, whatsapp is required, tilt free attitude is required.

Add me ingame if you are interested.
Let me know what your champ pool looks like for midlane.

best regards killermagier

replies.body: Ist für alle regionen offen :P Nur der Spieler sollte der englischen Sprache mächtig sein da unser coach und auch einige Spieler keine deutschen sind :)
Deutsches Forum. Wenn du was englisches suchst, dann wechsle auch auf Englisch x)
